website_summaries.verdict: Guide lines make this pricey mat helpful for committed beginners to take to class.
pros: Made with rubber, so it's PVC-free
cons: Slight sacrifice in comfort for the sake of portability
Consider using as a topper over provided mats at class

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING GRIP!
customer_reviews.text: It is just fantastic. I finally can do those difficult poses without slipping. And I think the cushioning is also great, although it is slimmer that the original. The aligning lines help me a lot, as I do yoga at home. However, I read that the gripping doesn't last for so long... I read about that only after I had purchased it... Only disappointment, because it is such an expensive product.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa Seerig

customer_reviews.title: This is the absolute best mat for hot yoga
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolute best mat for hot yoga, or for any yoga where you're going to sweat. YOU WILL NEVER EVER SLIP. Its tiny and so easy to take with you on the road. I have flown with it several times in the little travel case, and they've never even counted it as a carry-on. When you first get it, it is coated with some powdery stuff so you will think its slippery at first, but when you wipe the powder off you will be so amazed. Best grip ever.
customer_reviews.author: J. E. Miller

customer_reviews.title: These mats are the best! Perfect for ANY type of yoga
customer_reviews.text: These mats are the best! Perfect for ANY type of yoga. You will NOT slip in hot yoga. No awkward mat towel needed. I have taken this on several trips, permanent addition to the travel bag. It is light weight, has its own bag. I am six feet and need a longer mat. My husband is six three and he loves his liforme mat as well ! Easy to clean. Non slip surface, alignment markings are a reminder to maintain good form. Just love this mat❤
customer_reviews.author: ben loch farm

customer_reviews.title: The Best Yoga Mat
customer_reviews.text: This is the best mat I have ever used and I have tried many. The design is meticulously thought out. It has great grip during poses and is not stretchy like many of the latex mats. The size and weight are perfect to bring to class. I did not think I would use it much, but the alignment lines make my poses much stronger.
customer_reviews.author: Artsy Guy

customer_reviews.title: Eco friendly, and non slippery
customer_reviews.text: I love that this mat is compostable and that is what drew me to buy it. I use this mat at home so far and it is a wonderful non slippery mat. Cleaning is different- I use a vinegar and water spray like I do with my Manduka mat- but this mat just kind of absorbs the water and I can't really wipe anything away. No big deal so far for me. Initially the mat had a yucky (formaldehyde smell-to me). I don't smell it as strongly after having for a few months unless I'm in childs pose.
customer_reviews.author: LMS

customer_reviews.title: Its great just how I expected it perfect size and awesome ...
customer_reviews.text: Its great just how I expected it perfect size and awesome grip but I have alot of pets and hardwood floor so the back that's black and different material gets fur and dirt stuck to it and doesn't come off easily when shook, as it does in the front. Otherwise love this mat Im always using the alignment marks.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Non-slip
customer_reviews.text: PERFECTION! I've been practicing for four years now. The first few times I couldn't believe where my alignment was! The markings are so helpful. They are textured so you can feel where you should be. The mat is ultra grippy; no slipping here! The travel size is quite thin but it has to be because of the material. The at home mat is much heavier. It comes with the carrying case, which is great for the run around yogi. It doesn't have any pockets or anything. It was everything I wanted and everything I thought I was in for.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia

customer_reviews.title: BEST ONE BAR NONE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been practicing for 30 years. I have had EVERY mat on the market. I SWEAT ALOT!!!! I have never had a mat with this much grip. I am in love with this mat. No grip towel over my mat necessary!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: maryellen

customer_reviews.title: ... look and feel of the Liforme yoga matt is cool. The graphics help me place my hands and ...
customer_reviews.text: The look and feel of the Liforme yoga matt is cool. The graphics help me place my hands and feet properly and the straight line down the middle keeps me in balance. The matt is larger, and lighter than the Matts I’ve used in the past and has tremendous grip. I practice yoga 4 times per week at a fitness center and people are asking questions and commenting on the unique look
customer_reviews.author: Tom Evangelisti

customer_reviews.title: GREAT MAT!
customer_reviews.text: Although is a bit expensive and I have heard there are others with same anti slippery feature and cheaper (lululemon, manduka), I like this mat. Its size and weight, and I love the lines for my alignment. So good when is new because it is impossible to slide. I had another one that last ONLY 2 years with daily use. Super slippery now, I can't use it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: O. Acosta

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is everything I need for yoga. It's thin enough to travel, but still cushy. It does not slip and it cleans easily. The alignment marks are much needed since I'm a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: 5 star product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. So much better than my last mat. Expensive but worth the price in my opinion. The mat has an excellent grip so you don't need to use a towel. 5 stars for sure!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Davidson

customer_reviews.title: don’t get if you sweat buckets like me.....
customer_reviews.text: I sweat a LOT and although this mat is great when dry or slightly wet, i do slip at the end of a class when the mat is covered in a big puddle. Look for another mat if you sweat buckets like me. I tried to return it, but no go. And don’t get the blue one unless you’re comfortable with sweat stains (marks) when it dries out.....
customer_reviews.author: LOVESANDYEGGO

customer_reviews.title: Travel mat is very thin
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this mat. I didn’t realize I ordered the travel one, and when I opened it I thought I would give it a try. It’s too thin, making it difficult to roll over my toes . It was a very expensive mat and I don’t want to use it. I could have bought another brand and saved some money!
customer_reviews.author: Suzy q

customer_reviews.title: High quality-Compact-Position signs
customer_reviews.text: My favorite feature: the signs so you position your body well. The material is also very high quality. It’s compact so very easy to travel with to class or for weekends out of town.
customer_reviews.author: Yasmine

customer_reviews.title: Mat comes in 2 sizes . I purposely chose smaller due to space configuration
customer_reviews.text: High quality and great size overall. Bought this for a ASID Showhouse for the Luxury Fitness room. Product was recommended by a pilates /yoga instructor. It was easy to order from amazon vs their own site. Love the markings on the mat for easy guidance
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: New favorite mat.
customer_reviews.text: This mat is awesome. The alignment cues help a lot. I’ve also used this mat in a hot yoga class and no towel needed. Great grip. The only thing I noticed was the strong odor when I first opened it.
customer_reviews.author: withlovekm

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST MAT EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: THE BEST MAT EVER! I’ve owned the mat for just over a month and been practicing on it, I really like the grip and stability! Today I took a Hot class and did not use a mat towel! This mat ROCKS! I’m a “sweater” and it never lost grip. I’ll never own another mat brand!!
customer_reviews.author: Maryww729

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, too expensive
customer_reviews.text: This mat is so thin that it feels like I’m just doing yoga on a hardwood floor. Since I’ve been using this mat, I been getting calluses on my feet because the material is so thin. I also had to buy additional pads for my knees because the mat is so thin. Very expensive for poor quality.Not worth the money. Plus it’s hard to clean!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmin Gillispie

customer_reviews.title: It's exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I finally found a yoga mat that is non-slip. I've only used it for about a week or so, but so far I'm extremely satisfied with it . In the future I'll be ordering the wider one for home use.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Vokes

customer_reviews.title: ... was looking for a fairly affordable grippy mat really like this one
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a fairly affordable grippy mat really like this one. Tried many at lower prices but finally decided I would spend the money for one that truly grips and is comfortable. I don't like that when I sweat it turns the mat a different colour. Kathryn CO
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Wood

customer_reviews.title: Amazing but a bit thin :D
customer_reviews.text: Looove this mat :) although it is really thin and I struggle a bit as I am newer yogi without the cushion but beautiful and convenient
customer_reviews.author: Ximena

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful rich color, quality mat. As a yoga newbie, I really enjoy having the alignment markers. I wish it were a little thicker though.
customer_reviews.author: C. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Best mat on earth
customer_reviews.text: Totally worth the splurge! amazing grip, great size, useful markings, very high quality and sustainable
customer_reviews.author: Melibea

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for yoga on the go!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this mat! I also have the standard size Liforme mat and thus one is definitely much more portable.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Wandia

customer_reviews.title: Finally! A yoga mat that is slip free! ...
customer_reviews.text: Finally! A yoga mat that is slip free! I have much more confidence in my poses and transitions now!
customer_reviews.author: marianne ronay

customer_reviews.title: Mat it self is good but I would rather not have "OM" symbol on ...
customer_reviews.text: Mat it self is good but I would rather not have "OM" symbol on the mat. This is something I am going to put my feet/body on, for hindus "OM" is a very religious symbol and most hindus would not like to see it on the mat.
customer_reviews.author: A1122

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying!
customer_reviews.text: Very light, easy to carry to class each day. Good grip, no sliding.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Fernandez - Tarrago

customer_reviews.title: Best yoga mat so far!
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love, Love this mat!! It was time to do some mat shopping and with so many choices out there I really like to take my time to compare and read reviews. No regrets in choosing this mat! I need a non slip, light weight mat. This mat is exactly what I was looking for. The positioning lines on the mat are not only ingenious but are actually textured for a little extra grip and it's a cute design. I also comes with a bag which is nice since I travel for yoga retreats and workshops often. Thanks Lifeform for an awesome mat!! 🤙🌻🙆‍♀️🙏
customer_reviews.author: *MEG*

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I cleaned the mat after every session with the recommended cleaning method. A year later, it doesn’t matter how much I clean the mat, it always shows the white water marks.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Manalo

customer_reviews.title: I still love this mat
customer_reviews.text: I still love this mat! The grip is amazing. But be aware the reason this mat is 115 and not 140 is because it is the travel mat and not the yoga mat. The difference is the travel mat is not as cushioned as the yoga mat. If I would've known this I would not have bought the travel mat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
